price: Huo ndio mwendo wa Mwenyezi Mungu ulio kwisha pita zamani, wala hutapata mabadiliko katika mwendo wa Mwenyezi Mungu.
arabic: سُنَّةَ ٱللَّهِ ٱلَّتِي قَدۡ خَلَتۡ مِن قَبۡلُۖ وَلَن تَجِدَ لِسُنَّةِ ٱللَّهِ تَبۡدِيلٗا

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: sunnata al-lahi allatī qad khalat min qablu walan tajida lisunnati al-lahi tabdīlan
